title: House of Ghosts
description: She put her hands over her face. It was all around her. All haunted...Leave me alone, she thought.***The day twelve-year-old Grace Evans moves into her new home, she is thrilled to discover a painting that has been hidden there since 1861. But then she begins seeing the ghost of an unhappy girl- and is confronted with a a world of ghostly secrets that won't leave her alone. Her and step-dad think she's imagining things, and it's only when she meets Adam that Grace finds someone to confide in. Together they set out to make sense of the events of the past, and to bring peace to the house of ghosts...
author: Ann Turnbull
